message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me in the middle at $90?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming up, but $90 is still a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle at $105?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
